name: Mark Hazleton
introduction: Hi, my name is Mark Hazleton and I specialize in building scalable cloud-based solutions and full-stack development, with a passion for helping businesses improve their web presence.
about: Mark Hazleton is a Solution Architect and full-stack developer with over 15 years of experience, specializing in .NET, cloud architecture (Azure, AWS), and modern frontend frameworks. He helps businesses optimize their web presence and build robust, scalable applications tailored to their unique needs. With a proven track record across various industries, Mark delivers innovative technical solutions that drive business success. He shares his expertise through articles, tools, and projects at MarkHazleton.com, empowering developers and organizations to harness the power of modern technology.
